names.pinyin: wen shen zu yang zhong yao

actions: Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang, increases the libido, dispels Wind-Cold-Dampness and warms and unblocks the flow of Yang Qi.
Strengthens Yang, nourishes Yin, astringes Jing and urine, benefits the marrow, astringes diarrhea and tonifies the Kidneys and Liver.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, reduces swelling, expels pus and disperses Cold.
